      Mapper.Context      		 ContextFactory.cloneMapContext(MapContext<K1,V1,K2,V2> context, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf, RecordReader<K1,V1> reader, RecordWriter<K2,V2> writer)
      Copy a custom WrappedMapper.Context, optionally replacing the input and output.
      参数类型为Mapper.Context的org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected void Mapper.cleanup(Mapper.Context context)
      Called once at the end of the task.
      protected void Mapper.map(KEYIN key, VALUEIN value, Mapper.Context context)
      Called once for each key/value pair in the input split.
      void Mapper.run(Mapper.Context context)
      Expert users can override this method for more complete control over the execution of the Mapper.
      protected void Mapper.setup(Mapper.Context context)
      Called once at the beginning of the task.
